page.title: 06Langtoft Grange Farm 2
page.content: Dad tests the corn to see if it is ready. If it is below 17% it is ready and Stan can go and combine a field of barley. We Propcorn it to kill any bugs that are in the corn. About the 10th of{August}the barley is nearly finished now.The rape has been swathed about 10 days ago and it is ready now. There are 24 acres of rape and it takes 4 days to do because it has to be done going up hill. If you go down hill it hits the reel and falls out of the pods. Next comes the wheat. We have 75 acres. The combine harvests the wheat but when it is hot and it is below 15% we don't have to dry it. If it is producing 3 tonnes to the acre it is doing very well. We drilled the 54 acre field first and the 21 acre field second.
